availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Theodore H. Daviess, Jr. (Mercer County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Theodore H. Daviess, Sr. and Ann Mary Daviess. Resident of Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 1, p. 247B.
"Theodore Daviess (1850-1873)," Find A Grave, Memorial 196349576, accessed July 3, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/196349576.
